comments.content: Queen Mary not tht bad, just got back frm London 2 years ago. My suggestion for anyone who wants to go there the first time. Don't hang out too late and if u do stay wif someone u can trust n stay safe. Cuz I witness a gunshot crime scene while I was there n a skinny mofo with a knife who tried to rob me who eventually make out with the floor lol

first.content: Sounds scary!!!!!! But I'm still pretty excited about studying there. Hope that This kinda thing won't happen to me.
